name: Video Poker (itch)
description:
Visit the casino from the comfort of your home with authentic 9/6 jacks-or-better video poker for the PICO-8 fantasy console!

This game was originally posted on (and is playable with mobile web support on) the PICO-8 BBS: http://www.lexaloffle.com/bbs/?tid=2020. The browser version sometimes has audio lag issues, so the native executable version is recommended for the best experience.

Controls

This is a PICO-8 game, so the controls are the arrow keys with Z/X (or C/V or N/M)
